prompt_preview:
# Pull Request Generation

Generate a pull request title and description for completed work.

**CRITICAL: Your ENTIRE response must be ONLY a valid JSON object. NO markdown, NO code blocks, NO explana

parts.text:
Now I have all the context needed. Let me generate the JSON response:

```json
{"title": "DAI-151: Add GET /api/status health check endpoint", "description": "Implements a GET /api/status endpoint for server health monitoring and diagnostics.\\n\\nChanges:\\n- Added server startup time tracking in backend/server.js\\n- Implemented /api/status endpoint returning server status, uptime, MongoDB connection state, and timestamp\\n- Added comprehensive test suite for the health endpoint in backend/tests/api.test.js with 6 test cases\\n- Updated README.md with new endpoint documentation\\n\\nImplementation Details:\\n- Returns JSON response with: status (ok), uptime (seconds), mongodb (connected/disconnected), timestamp (ISO 8601)\\n- Response time optimized for monitoring systems - no database queries performed\\n- HTTP status code 200 regardless of MongoDB connection state (standard practice for health checks)\\n- Integrated with existing isMongoConnected() function from db/connection.js\\n\\nLinks:\\n- JIRA Issue: DAI-151\\n- Implementation Plan: ai_docs/specs/feature/DAI-151-39534155-plan.md"}
```
